ComicInfo.Title: Poached Like a Salmon
ComicInfo.Series: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency: A Spoon Too Short
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Spoon Too Short is Dirk Gently’s most baffling and incomprehensible case. Inspired by the tantalizing alternative title for the Dirk adventure Douglas Adams was working on prior to his death, A Spoon Too Short follows the continuing adventures of the world’s weirdest detective all the way to Africa!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ilias Kyriazis | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Robert Hack (a) & Stephen Downer (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Brian Miller | 3 | Note: The chapter title is incorrectly listed as Chapter 2 in the comic.
